name: Space Pilot Destroyer
description:
Space Pilot Destroyer is the first game I have ever made and I sat here in my room from about midnight to 5am making this because I couldn't sleep and was eager to start making stuff. Enjoy your 30 second gameplay in the action shooter arcade game that took me 5 hours! LOL

If you have any pointers or tips please let me know so I can grow! 

WASD Controls and Spacebar to shoot
